item.title: There are a load of branches that look unsightly under the roadsign near 110 and 112 Barnewood road, 6th May
item.description:
There are a load of branches that look unsightly under the roadsign near 110 and 112 Barnwood road - They've been there for months - please can someone collect them - I beleive the council cut them down, but they failed to collect them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Pittville Lawn, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Double yellow lines need to be repainted at St Catherine's car park - 21 Pittville Lawn -, 6th May
item.description:
We are the manageing agent for St Catherine's - 21 Pitville Lawn, GL52 2BE, the residents of this block have asked if we could ask if "perhaps the council would come and re-paint double yellows across the full width of the entrance to our car park?"m please let me know on 01242 521129 my email address is jen@youngandgilling.com

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Pittville Lawn, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
